LanguageData.NymphTamed_desc: Spawns pawn with ('Hypersexual' trait) to join the colony.
LanguageData.NymphWild_desc: Spawns wild pawn with ('Hypersexual' trait) to attack the colony.
LanguageData.NymphRaidEasy_desc: Nymphomaniacs decided to visit your colony.\nbaseChance is 0.1.
LanguageData.NymphRaidHard_desc: Nymphomaniacs decided it is now their colony.\n(Game Over).\nbaseChance is 0.01.
LanguageData.futa_natives_chance_desc:
Futa/Trap natives spawn chance 
(industrial techlevel and below) 

Valid range: 0 - 100
Default: 0
LanguageData.sexneed_decay_rate_desc: 0% for no decay.\n1000000% for Rapeturnus Planet. Recommended range: 50% to 200%.
LanguageData.SexMinimumAge_desc: Humanlike Pawns younger than this will not have sex at all.
LanguageData.SexFreeForAllAge_desc: Humanlike Pawns younger than this will only have sex with pawns with 2 years age difference.
LanguageData.bestiality_enabled_desc: Enable acts of bestiality. Desired and not so much.
LanguageData.animal_on_animal_enabled_desc: Enable wild animals mating. Tamed animals will still mate within their own species regardless of this setting.\nEnable interspecies sex between (designated) animals, which may result in pregnancy.
LanguageData.necrophilia_enabled_desc: Enable sex with corpses. Usually limited to pawns with Necrophiliac trait, but others can sometimes do it if they are sexually frustrated.
LanguageData.sounds_enabled_desc: Enables RJW-specific sounds. Note that this has no effect on core settings: if you have sound completely disabled, this does nothing.
LanguageData.cum_filth_desc: Enables cum filth after sex. Note that disabling this will make the game easier, because of the lack of filth and need for cleaning.
LanguageData.cum_on_body_amount_adjust_desc: All cum applied to pawn bodies will be multiplied by this amount.
LanguageData.cum_overlays_desc: Enables cum overlay(may have conflicts with mods that change pawn appearance).
LanguageData.STD_FromFloors_desc: Pawns will catch STDs from dirty environment.
LanguageData.RPG_hero_control_desc: Player can set 1 pawn as a player character and have direct unconditional control
LanguageData.RPG_hero_control_HC_desc: HARDCORE: Player can only control hero, get some lube, you'll need a lot of it.\n(intended for multiplayer)
LanguageData.RPG_hero_control_Ironman_desc: HARDCORE: Player can set hero only once
LanguageData.designated_freewill_desc: Pawn designated for comfort or mating can initiate sex.
LanguageData.rape_enabled_desc: See what you like? Take it by force, you can make a hat out of it later.
LanguageData.PrisonersBeating_desc: Beat the hell out of victims while raping them.
LanguageData.ColonistCanCP_desc: Colonists are allowed to rape comfort pawns.
LanguageData.VisitorsCanCP_desc: Visitors are allowed to rape comfort pawns.
LanguageData.AnimalsCanCP_desc: Animals are allowed to rape comfort pawns. Requires zoophilia to be enabled.
LanguageData.NonFutaWomenRaping_MaxVulnerability_desc:
Only women with vulnerability lower than this will ever rape others. 
Animals vulnerability is always 100%. 
To check 'vulnerability' status, go to 'view information about this object' > stats.

Valid range: 0 - 300%
LanguageData.Rapee_MinVulnerability_human_desc:
Human pawns with vulnerability higher than this will be raping targets. 
To check 'vulnerability' status, go to 'view information about this object' > stats.

Valid range: 0 - 300%
LanguageData.Rapee_MinVulnerability_animals_desc:
Animals with vulnerability higher than this will be raping targets for zoophiles. 
To check 'vulnerability' status, go to 'view information about this object' > stats.

Valid range: 0 - 300%
LanguageData.SettingHookupsEnabled_desc: Controls whether single pawns can have casual sex with other single pawns
LanguageData.SettingQuickHookupsEnabled_desc: Controls whether single pawns can have casual quick sex with other single pawns\nWarning: This can interrupt working pawns.
LanguageData.SettingNoHookupsDuringWorkHours_desc: Controls whether pawns can seek casual sex during work hours.\nNyphomaniacs ignore this.
LanguageData.SettingColonistsCanHookup_desc: Controls whether colonists are allowed to look for casual sex.
LanguageData.SettingColonistsCanHookupWithVisitor_des: Controls whether pawns can have casual sex with visitors to the colony.
LanguageData.SettingCanHookupWithPrisoner_desc: Controls whether non-prisoner pawns can look for consensual sex with prisoners.\nThis is unaffected by the Comfort Prisoner designation and is considered consensual by both parties.
LanguageData.SettingVisitorsCanHookupWithColonists_de: Controls whether visiting pawns include colonists as potential partners for casual sex.
LanguageData.SettingVisitorsCanHookupWithVisitors: Visitors can hookup with other visitors
LanguageData.SettingVisitorsCanHookupWithVisitors_des: Controls whether visiting pawns include other visitors as potential partners for casual sex.
LanguageData.SettingPrisonersCanHookupWithNonPrisoner: Controls whether prisoners include non-prisoners as potential partners for casual sex.\nPawns, including prisoners, can only have sex with someone they can reach, so if the prisoner can't leave their cell this is moot.
LanguageData.SettingPrisonersCanHookupWithPrisoner_de: Controls whether prisoners include other prisoners as potential partners for casual sex.\nPawns, including prisoners, can only have sex with someone they can reach, so if the prisoner can't leave their cell this is moot.
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanPickAnyone_desc: Controls whether nyphomaniac ('Hypersexual' trait) pawns will pick anyone available.\nThey still obey the cheating and homewrecking settings below.
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanCheat_desc: Controls whether nyphomaniac ('Hypersexual' trait) pawns can cheat if they're sexually frustrated.
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanHomewreck_desc: Controls whether nyphomaniac ('Hypersexual' trait) pawns will bang people who already have partners.
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanHomewreckReverse_desc: Controls whether nyphomaniac ('Hypersexual' trait) pawns will accept sex even if they have partner.
LanguageData.SettingHookupChanceForNonNymphos_desc: The chance that a horny pawn will look for casual sex.\nOnly checked once per hour and only when the pawn finishes their current task. Default is 30%
LanguageData.SettingMinimumFuckabilityToHookup_desc: Controls how attractive(RJW) both pawns must be other to consider a hookup.\n Default is 10%.
LanguageData.SettingMinimumAttractivenessToHookup_des: Controls how attractive(Rimworld) pawns to eachother to consider a hookup.\n Default is 50%.\n Nyphomaniac > 0.
LanguageData.SettingMinimumRelationshipToHookup_desc: Controls minimum pawns opinion for eachother to consider a hookup.\n Default is 20.\n Nyphomaniac > 0.
LanguageData.submit_button_enabled_desc: Submit button allows you to skip more deadly part and get right to more humiliating one. \nDisable this if honor comes before life for you. \nRemember, if you change your mind, it will always be here, waiting for you.
LanguageData.RJW_designation_box_desc: Toggles showing RJW group of buttons in the pawn control GUI.
LanguageData.StackRjwParts_desc: Stack rjw parts in pawn health tab \n(Label x count)
LanguageData.maxDistancetowalk_desc:
Sets how much effort pawn AI willing to do to reach sex destination/target(PawnPath). This is affected by obstacles, pawn speed and ground modifiers.
 Default 250 ~20 cells.

If set less than 100, uses cells distance(DistanceToSquared), which is probably less stressful than pathing, but ignores obstacles (e.g. walls, mountains), which can make pawn walk half map.
LanguageData.override_RJW_designation_checks_desc: Allows to set designations on all colonists ignoring conditions.\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.override_control_desc: Player can manually tell pawns to do sex related activities.\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Rapist_desc: Chance to gain rapist trait after 10 sex acts, >12% of which are rapes\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Masocist_desc: Chance to gain masochist trait after being raped, 5% after feeling broken stage\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Nymphomaniac_desc: Chance to gain hypersexual trait after 10 sex acts, while under HumpShroom addiction\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Necrophiliac_desc: Chance to gain necrophiliac trait after 10 sex acts, >50% of which with corpses\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Nerves_desc: Gain nerves trait after being raped\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.AddTrait_Zoophiliac_desc: Chance to gain zoophiliac trait after 10 sex acts, >50% of which with animals\n YOU CHEATER
LanguageData.override_lovin_desc: Use casual sex instead of vanila lovin
LanguageData.override_matin_desc: Use breeding instead of vanila matin
LanguageData.WildMode_desc: EXPERIMENTAL - DO NOT REPORT BUGS IF THIS IS ENABLED. \n\nNo rules for sex. Most limiting requirements are turned off. Enjoy the wildest side of Rimworld.
LanguageData.GenderlessAsFuta_desc: USEATYOUROWNRISK. \n\nGenderless Pawns will be set as Female and have both sets of genitals.
LanguageData.DevMode_desc: Enables RimJobWorld logging and stuff. You don't usually want this enabled.
LanguageData.DebugLogJoinInBed_desc: Enables some very spamming debug logs to help find bugs in JoinInBed operations. \nOnly devs (or someone helping them find a bug) should enable this.
LanguageData.DebugWhoring_desc: Enables some very spamming debug logs to help find bugs in Whoring solicitation operations. \nOnly devs (or someone helping them find a bug) should enable this.
LanguageData.RJWH_pregnancy_desc: Use RJW pregnancy for human-human pregnancies.
LanguageData.PregnantCoeffecientForHuman_desc: Human pregnancy chances in percent.\n\nValid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.RJWB_pregnancy_desc: Use RJW pregnancy for human-animal pregnancies.
LanguageData.PregnantCoeffecientForAnimals_desc: Animal pregnancy chances in percent.\n\nValid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.InterspeciesImpregnantionModifier_desc: Interspecies impregnation modifier in percent. At 20% this cuts the normal chance to fifth of same-species, and so on.\n\nValid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.UseParentMethod_desc: ON:Babies have random parent dna.\nOFF:Babies are like mothers.
LanguageData.OffspringLookLikeTheirMother_desc:
Governs humanlike pregnancies. 
100% means born babies will be of mothers race. 
At 0% means born babies will be of father race.

Valid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.OffspringIsHuman_desc:
Governs Humanlike-Animal and Animal-Animal pregnancies.
100% means born babies will be of "mother" race. 
At 0% means born babies will be of "father" race.

Valid range: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.OffspringIsHuman2_desc:
Governs Humanlike-Animal pregnancies.

 left - born babies will be of beast race. 

 right - born babies will be of humanlike race.
LanguageData.RJWA_pregnancy_desc: Use RJW pregnancy for animal-animal pregnancies.
LanguageData.RJWI_pregnancy_desc: Use RJW pregnancy for ovipositor egg pregnancies.
LanguageData.egg_pregnancy_implant_anyone_desc: ON:Anyone with female ovipositor can implant eggs.\nOFF:Only predefined parent type can implant eggs.
LanguageData.egg_pregnancy_fertilize_anyone_desc: ON:Anyone with male ovipositor can fertilize eggs.\nOFF:Only predefined parent type or same as implanter can fertilize eggs.
LanguageData.MechanoidImplanting_desc: Allow probing and implanting by mechanoids.
LanguageData.CP_pregnancy: Use RimWorldChildren pregnancy for pregnancies between humanlikes
LanguageData.CP_pregnancy_desc: Controlls whether RJW should use own pregnancy or RimWorldChildren for human-human pregnancies.
LanguageData.genetic_trait_filter_desc: If enabled, it will use the rjw/Defs/NonInheritedTraits.xml to filter out the traits that should not be passed to next generation. If disabled, everything is a fair game.
LanguageData.RJW_fertility_endAge_male_desc: Adjusted by lifespan for alien races. Same scale is used for animals and humanlikes.
LanguageData.RJW_fertility_endAge_female_humanlike_de: Unlike most animals, human females become infertile at early age. Same ratio is used for all alien races, for balance.
LanguageData.RJW_fertility_endAge_female_animal_desc: Unlike humans, most female animals remain fertile until death.
LanguageData.ComplexImpregnation_desc:
When enabled, the impregnation chance between species depends on the difference in the body structure and size. Examples: Human/Winged humanoid : ~95% Human/Harpy : ~75% Human/Dog : ~30% Human/Chicken : ~5% Wolf/Dog : ~95% Wolf/Chicken : ~5% Rooster/Harpy : ~30%
Note that the chance is further lowered by the base animal and human pregnancy sliders.
LanguageData.vaginal_desc:
Frequency of vaginal sex. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as available orifices, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 120
LanguageData.cunnilingus_desc:
Frequency of oral stimulation of vagina. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as available orifices, rape, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 80
LanguageData.anal_desc:
Frequency of anal penetration (penile). Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as available orifices, rape, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 80
LanguageData.rimming_desc:
Frequency of oral stimulation of anus. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as available orifices, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 40
LanguageData.fellatio_desc:
Frequency of fellatio, also known as blowjob. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as available orifices, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 80
LanguageData.handjob_desc:
Frequency of handjobs. Requires working hands. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as whoring, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 80
LanguageData.mutual_masturbation_desc:
Frequency of mutual masturbation (two colonists masturbating each other). Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as rape, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 70
LanguageData.double_penetration_desc:
Frequency of double-penetration, simultaneous anal and vaginal. Requires a multi-penis, such as a hemipenis. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as available orifices, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default:60
LanguageData.breastjob_desc:
Frequency of breastjobs. Requires one pawn to have breasts, and the other to have a penis. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as whoring, rape, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 50
LanguageData.fingering_desc:
Frequency of vaginal fingering. Requires one pawn to have a vagina, and the other to have a working hand. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as whoring, rape, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 50
LanguageData.scissoring_desc:
Frequency of scissoring (type of tribadism where partners interlock their legs and grind their vulvae together). Requires both pawns to have vaginas.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 50
LanguageData.footjob_desc:
Frequency of footjobs (stimulation of penis by foot). Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as whoring, rape, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 30
LanguageData.fisting_desc:
Frequency of anal fisting (vaginal not yet implemented). Requires one partner to have a working hand. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as whoring, rape, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 30
LanguageData.sixtynine_desc:
Frequency of 69 (mutual oral). Requires both partners to have genitalia. Note that this frequency is further adjusted by factors such as whoring, rape, etc.

Valid range: 1 - 200
Default: 69
LanguageData.FapEverywhere_desc: Pawn will masturbate where it wants.
LanguageData.FapInBed_desc: Pawn will masturbate in its bed.
LanguageData.RapeAlertCP_desc: Show alert when pawn designated for comforting is getting raped.
LanguageData.RapeAlertBreeding_desc: Show alert when pawn designated for breeding is getting raped.
LanguageData.SexualitySpread2: Sexuality generation spread for RJW.\nTHIS IS FOR SEX ONLY\nHAS NO EFFECT ON RELATIONSHIP
LanguageData.SexualityAsexual_desc: Low or non-existent sex drive, generally not interested in sex.
LanguageData.SexualityBisexual_desc: Bisexuals are attracted to both males and females.
LanguageData.SexualityGay_desc: Homosexuals are attracted to same sex.
LanguageData.MaxQuirks_desc: Max quirks pawn can get when created.
LanguageData.RJW_Opportunistic_Infection_Message: {0} has developed an infection due to the weakened immune system.
LanguageData.RJW_Syphilis_Damage_Message: {0} has suffered permanent damage to {1} {2} due to an advanced {3} infection.
LanguageData.RJW_VisitorSickWhore: {0} rejected the offer because {1} does not look healthy
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP: The target isn't healthy enough or is in a forbidden position.
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP0: The pawn don't need sex, is not healthy, or cannot rape.
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP1: The pawn is not single or has his partner around.
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP2: The pawn is not zoophile so can't rape animals.
LanguageData.CommandSubmitDesc: Lay down and accept whatever to cum.
LanguageData.RJW_PregnantText: {0} is pregnant and is going to be a mother soon. Be aware, starvation and trauma may result in loss of child.
LanguageData.RJW_Contractions: {0} is having contractions! Baby(ies) is(are) on the way!
LanguageData.RJW_PregnantStrange: Something is unusual about the baby...
LanguageData.RJW_PregnantMechStrange: Something is Very strange about the baby...
LanguageData.RJW_EggContractions: {0} is having contractions! Eggs are on the way!
LanguageData.ForComfortRefuseDesc: Wont agree to be used for comfort\nReq: masochist trait
LanguageData.ForServiceDesc: Mark for whoring - Will try to hook up with visitors. - Entertains other colonists if not busy. - Tries to refrain from masturbation while on the job, may cause frustration.
LanguageData.ForServiceRefuseDesc: Wont agree to be a whore
LanguageData.ForBreedingRefuseDesc: Wont agree to be mounted by animals\nReq: zoophile trait
LanguageData.ForBreedingAnimalDesc: Allow this animal to mount designated breeders
LanguageData.ForMilkingDesc: Harvest biological materials from this being
LanguageData.ForHeroDesc: Set pawn as player character -Can only be set once. -Can't be turned off.
LanguageData.ForHeroRefuse1Desc: This is hero of other player
LanguageData.ForHeroRefuse2Desc: You have no right to change designation
LanguageData.MessyQuirk: {pawn} not only produces copious amounts of fluid during sex but {pawn_pronoun} rarely bothers to clean {pawn_possessive}self afterwards.
LanguageData.PodophileQuirk: {pawn} really likes feet and prefers foot-related sex acts.
LanguageData.TeratophileQuirk: {pawn} prefers ugly partners. {pawn_pronoun} would also prefer larger and wilder animals if {pawn_pronoun} were into that sort of thing...
LanguageData.EndytophileQuirk: {pawn} prefers to keep {pawn_possessive} clothes on during sex.
LanguageData.ExhibitionistQuirk: {pawn} enjoys having sex where others can see.
LanguageData.GerontophileQuirk: {pawn} prefers older partners (55+ on a human scale).
LanguageData.FertileQuirk: {pawn} has unusually high fertility and so is more likely to have children.
LanguageData.InfertileQuirk: {pawn} has unusually low fertility and so is unlikely to have children.
LanguageData.ImpregnationFetishQuirk: {pawn} really likes the idea of someone becoming pregnant. {pawn_pronoun} prefers partners and sex positions where there is a possibility of pregnancy. {pawn_pronoun} doesn't care if {pawn_pronoun} is getting pregnant or {pawn_possessive} partner is as long as babby is formed.
LanguageData.PregnancyFetishQuirk: {pawn} prefers partners who are visibly pregnant.
LanguageData.IncubatorQuirk: {pawn} has birthed so many eggs that {pawn_possessive} body has adapted to handling them. {pawn_possessive} egg incubation speed has increased.
LanguageData.BreederQuirk: {pawn} has given birth so many times that {pawn_possessive} body has adapted to breeding. {pawn_possessive} pregnancies are shorter and produce more offspring.
LanguageData.VigorousQuirk: {pawn} is invigorated by sex. {pawn_pronoun} feels more rested afterwards than before.
LanguageData.ChitinLoverQuirk: {pawn} enjoys the smooth strength of a chitinous exoskeleton. {pawn_pronoun} prefers arachnoid or insectoid partners.
LanguageData.DemonLoverQuirk: {pawn} is after the naughty ones. {pawn_pronoun} prefers {pawn_possessive} partners to come from the literal depths of hell, or at least look the part.
LanguageData.FeatherLoverQuirk: {pawn} loves that downy fluff. {pawn_pronoun} prefers avian or dinosaur partners. Because dinosaurs are birds and have feathers, as {pawn_pronoun} will explain at great length if given a chance.
LanguageData.FurLoverQuirk: {pawn} prefers a partner with a thick, luxurious, snuggly-soft coat of fur.
LanguageData.PlantLoverQuirk: {pawn} likes watering plants. If you know what I mean.
LanguageData.RobotLoverQuirk: Which is better, 2D or 3D? {pawn} knows that 3D-printed gives you the best of both worlds.
LanguageData.ScaleLoverQuirk: Who wouldn't want to fuck a dragon? Definitely not {pawn}. {pawn} wants to fuck a dragon.
LanguageData.SkinLoverQuirk: {pawn} prefers {pawn_possessive} partners to have smooth sensitive skin without fur or scales getting in the way. Lucky for {pawn_objective} humans are all over the place.
LanguageData.SlimeLoverQuirk: Because of their slippery and malleable nature slimes are very, very good at sex. As you will hear over and over if you listen to {pawn} talk for any length of time.
